list.description:
Well well well.

How to install:
-Create UserSights folder in your folder with installed WT
-Open folder "all_tanks"
-Copy everything from zip file to that folder
-Restart the game or launch it
-Go to Options -> Main -> Ground vehicle Battle Settings -> Sight settings
-Find "Redicle" on the right
-Switch Default grid sight to one of the custom sights.
-Done

I did it purely as a warm-up to check what I still remembered after two years, so it's very crooked and skewed. Not only did I forget a lot, but I also chose one that was difficult to do.

NEW TO HELICOPTER COLLIMATOR SIGHTS, PLEASE PROVIDE FEEDBACK!

Helicopter collimator sight for the AH-1G and AH-1Q models in the US and ISR trees. I do not fly choppers so I took my best guess at how they can be predictably aimed. Collective in percentage and AoA in degrees are marked for use with rockets. Sighting distance is intended for 300-600m.

TO AIM ROCKETS: Set Collective to marked value on the left, OR m...

#Kurvinox #kapitan_bomba #wtdraw
